The math test was a piece of cake

5.sentence: If I ___ a famous scientist, I would try to find a cure for all diseases.
This beautiful castle ___ built in the 15th century.

The email ___ sent yet; there is a problem with the internet.
I wouldn't be so tired now if I ___ to bed earlier last night.
You can't go to the concert ___ you finish your homework first.
The rules of the game must ___ explained clearly to everyone.
